rows.label: qst200519_msg0101
rows.name:
I'm really proud of this recipe, if
I do say so myself. Cookies that change
flavor with each one you try...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0102
rows.name:
And the way they crumble in your
mouth... Yeah, I'm liking this!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0103
rows.name: We can put this on the menu for sure!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0104
rows.name:
Now, I think it's time we gave
some thought to flans...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0105
rows.name:
We can't just let the cookies
steal all the limelight, can we?

rows.label: qst200519_msg0106
rows.name:
I've already thought of
four recipes we can use.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0107
rows.name:
I just hope one of them
will be good enough to
sell as a staple here...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0108
rows.name:
Hmm... It's not spicy, but
somehow it makes you feel warm
and tingly on the inside.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0109
rows.name:
I'm getting a hint of
Acedian tea leaves...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0110
rows.name:
Wait... This isn't just spicy...
My entire body is heating up!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0111
rows.name: Water... Water!!!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0112
rows.name:
I don't think anyone will want a
cookie that'll make them run for
water. We'll have to start over.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0113
rows.name:
It's pretty mild... Maybe slightly
bitter... These would definitely
appeal more to the savory palate.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0114
rows.name:
My one concern is the smell.
It's not the most pleasant...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0115
rows.name:
I don't think we'll be able to
put this on the menu, no. We'll
need to start over from scratch.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0201
rows.name:
Ah! It's like... My head seems
to feel clearer with each bite!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0202
rows.name: These are incredibly appetizing!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0203
rows.name:
Yeah, this will be perfect
for the menu! Customers are
sure to come back for more!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0204
rows.name:
...Right. I think that's enough
for the warming up stage.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0205
rows.name:
We've got decent recipes
lined up for the cookies
and the flans, but now...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0206
rows.name:
It's time to bring out the hallmark
of any patisserie: the cake!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0207
rows.name:
We're going to make the best cake
Alst has ever known and turn it
into our number one product!

rows.label: qst200519_msg0208
rows.name: Well, it has a very pleasant taste...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0209
rows.name:
But it lacks that little
something, that oomph... I
think we should try again.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0210
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0211
rows.name:
It's the right consistency, all
right, but I don't think it's
really got enough sweetness to it.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0212
rows.name:
I thought we might be able
to evoke the warm fuzzy
feeling of first love...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0213
rows.name:
But it seems I don't have the skill
for it. No, we'll have to redo it.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0214
rows.name:
As I'm eating this...I can't
help but feel incredibly sad...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0215
rows.name:
My heart aches... I can feel
tears welling up in my eyes...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0216
rows.name:
There's nothing wrong with the taste,
but I don't think anyone will order a
dessert that makes them depressed...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0217
rows.name:
We'll just have to try
something else then.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0301
rows.name:
Well, it's eye-catching,
that's for sure.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0302
rows.name:
But aside from that, it's
not so special. It tastes
just like any other torte.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0303
rows.name: I think we'll have to start over.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0304
rows.name:
Hmm. I tried making waffles according
to the alignment of the stars for
good fortune, but, well...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0305
rows.name:
I doubt we'll be ushering in any
sort of luck with that taste...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0306
rows.name:
We should probably try something
a little less quirky, maybe.

rows.label: qst200519_msg0307
rows.name:
I know I was trying to create a very
sugary creation with this one...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0308
rows.name:
But I may have overdone it a tad.
A single serving of this would put
anyone off sugar for a week...

rows.label: qst200519_msg0309
rows.name:
I don't think it's ready to go on
sale yet. We'll have to do it over.
